sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import Dashboard from './Dashboard'; import './Dashboard.scss'; import { Table, Button, Form } from 'tabler-react'; import { Modal } from 'react-bootstrap'; class Wallet extends React.Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.value = 1; this.USDexchange = 27000; this.modalShow = false; this.modalShowWD = false; } onWDsubmit = (event) => { event.preventDefault(); alert(event.target.value) document.getElementById("divHint").style.display = "inline-block"; return; } switchModalShow() { this.modalShow = !this.modalShow; console.log("modalshow = " + this.modalShow) this.forceUpdate(); return; } switchModalWDShow() { this.modalShowWD = !this.modalShowWD; console.log("modalshow = " + this.modalShowWD) this.forceUpdate(); return; } USD(value, USDexchange) { return value * USDexchange; } addressVal = (event) => { console.log(event) console.log(event.nativeEvent.data) } render() { console.log('render called') return (
Type Friendly Name Address Value Value in USD Actions

BTC

 Long-Time-Storage bc1qm6qv2jdgjmt4krahrw9wpcyt5mmt7g8h5hz0av {this.value} BTC {this.USD(this.value, this.USDexchange)} $
Approved Address Approval Date bc1qm6****5884 2019-10-10
Deposit to Wallet

To deposit to this wallet, please use the following address:

bc1qm6qv2jdgjmt4krahrw9wpcyt5mmt7g8h5hz0av

Note: For safety reasons it is required to deposit a set amount of BTC to enable withdrawing to a new address.

This process only needs to be done once.
Withdraw from Wallet
Address Amount

For safety reasons it is required to approve new addresses before withdrawing is allowed.

After a successful deposit surpassing the configured limit (0.02 BTC), a new address is approved.

Approved Addresses have no withdrawal limit.
) } } export default Wallet;
